sentences.en: An ornamental European spurge (Euphorbia lathyris) having a latex considered to be a potential source of hydrocarbons that can be converted into fuel.
sentences.cn: 一种装饰性欧洲大戟植物（续随子大戟属） ，它所含的一种乳液据认为是一种潜在的碳氢化合物的来源，可转化成燃料。

sentences.en: It is used to adhere spurge , cloth. EVA, leather, imitation leather , paper carton etc.
sentences.cn: 用于离型纸上不干胶复合布类 、 海绵 、 人造毛皮等.

sentences.en: The morphological characteristics, biological characteristics and adaptability of caper spurge are reported.
sentences.cn: 报道了引进的能源植物黄鼠树的形态特征 、 生物学特性以及在引种地的适应性.

trans.tran_en: any of various euphorbiaceous plants of the genus Euphorbia that have milky sap and small flowers typically surrounded by conspicuous bracts
